page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF KATHI 2
page.content: (Afternoon) After lunch of sandwiches,crisps,cake biscuits,fruit & a drink we went pond dipping,our group caught many small creatures.We got back to school at 3p.m.Two friends came to my house to make sweets (fudge, truffles,coconut ice & marzipan)for Fathers Day.Ellen stayed for tea of steak & kidney pie or stew plus vegetables,with chocolate pudding for sweet.After tea we cycled to choir where we practiced Sundays hymns.There was about 15 of us there. After choir Ellen and I parted and cycled home.I watched top of the pops and a few other programmes on television until I went to bed at 10.30.
